targets.rawSql:
WITH SpeedData AS (
  SELECT 
    speed,
    temperature,
    COUNT(*) as samples,
    ROUND(AVG((power / speed) * 1000), 1) AS consumption
  FROM (
    SELECT 
      ROUND(convert_km(speed::numeric, '$length_unit') / ($speed_step * 1.0)) * $speed_step AS speed,
      ROUND(AVG(convert_celsius(outside_temp, '$temp_unit') / ($temperature_step * 1.0)) OVER(ORDER BY date ROWS BETWEEN 50 PRECEDING AND 50 FOLLOWING)) * $temperature_step AS temperature,
      power
    FROM positions 
    WHERE $__timeFilter(date) AND car_id = $car_id AND speed > 0 AND (id % (100 / $datapoints)::integer = 0 OR outside_temp IS NOT NULL)
  ) AS RawData
  WHERE temperature IS NOT NULL AND speed > 0 
  GROUP BY temperature, speed
)
SELECT
  speed, temperature,
  consumption, 
  (1000 * $current_capacity / consumption) AS range,
  ROUND(100 * (samples * speed) / (SELECT SUM(speed * samples) FROM SpeedData), 3) AS distance_percentage,
  ROUND((samples * speed) / (SELECT SUM(speed * samples) FROM SpeedData AS SampleData WHERE SampleData.temperature = SpeedData.temperature), 3) AS at_temperature_percentage
FROM SpeedData 
WHERE consumption > 0 AND speed > 0 AND samples > (200*($datapoints/100.0)) 
ORDER BY speed, temperature

panels.title: Driven Distance Percentage by Speed & Temperature

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  convert_celsius(temperature, '$temp_unit') AS temperature, AVG(consumption) AS consumption
FROM (
  SELECT 
    ROUND(outside_temp_avg/($temperature_step*1.0)) * $temperature_step AS temperature, 
    (NULLIF(GREATEST(start_rated_range_km - end_rated_range_km, 0), 0) * cars.efficiency * (1000 / convert_km(distance::numeric, '$length_unit'))) AS consumption
  FROM 
    drives JOIN cars ON drives.car_id = cars.id WHERE drives.car_id = $car_id AND convert_km(distance::numeric, '$length_unit') BETWEEN 1 AND 20
) S1 GROUP BY temperature ORDER BY temperature ASC

SELECT 
  convert_celsius(temperature, '$temp_unit') AS longtemp, AVG(consumption) AS longconsumption
from (
  SELECT 
    ROUND(outside_temp_avg/($temperature_step*1.0)) * $temperature_step AS temperature, 
    (NULLIF(GREATEST(start_rated_range_km - end_rated_range_km, 0), 0)*cars.efficiency * (1000 / convert_km(distance::numeric, '$length_unit'))) AS consumption
  FROM 
    drives JOIN cars ON drives.car_id = cars.id WHERE drives.car_id = $car_id AND convert_km(distance::numeric, '$length_unit') > 20 
) S1 GROUP BY temperature ORDER BY temperature ASC

panels.title: Short & Long Trips Consumption by Temperature

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  start_date::date AS time,
  consumption/(convert_km(distance::numeric, '$length_unit')/100) AS consumption
FROM (
  SELECT 
    start_date,
    SUM(distance*consumption/100) OVER(ORDER BY start_date ROWS BETWEEN 1 PRECEDING AND 1 FOLLOWING) AS consumption,
    SUM(distance) OVER(ORDER BY start_date ROWS BETWEEN 1 PRECEDING AND 1 FOLLOWING) AS distance
  FROM (
    SELECT 
      start_date, SUM(distance) AS distance, 
      SUM(distance*consumption)/SUM(distance) AS consumption
    FROM (
      SELECT 
        TO_CHAR(start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS start_date,
        (end_km-start_km) AS distance,
        (NULLIF(GREATEST(start_rated_range_km - end_rated_range_km, 0), 0)*cars.efficiency * (1000/distance)) AS consumption
      FROM 
        drives JOIN cars ON drives.car_id = cars.id  WHERE drives.car_id = $car_id
    ) S1 WHERE consumption > 0 GROUP BY start_date ORDER BY start_date ASC
  ) S2 GROUP BY start_date, distance, consumption ORDER BY start_date
) S3 ORDER BY start_date

SELECT 
  start_date::date as time,
  ROUND(convert_celsius(temperature, '$temp_unit')) AS temperature_$temp_unit
FROM (
  SELECT 
    start_date,
    AVG(temperature) OVER(ORDER BY start_date ROWS BETWEEN 1 PRECEDING AND 1 FOLLOWING) AS temperature
  FROM (
    SELECT 
      start_date, avg(temperature) as temperature
    FROM 
      (
        SELECT 
          to_char(start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as start_date,
          --(end_km-start_km) as distance,
          outside_temp_avg as temperature
        FROM 
          drives join cars on drives.car_id = cars.id  where drives.car_id = $car_id
      ) S1 group by start_date order by start_date asc
  ) S2 group by start_date, temperature order by start_date
) S3 order by start_date

list.definition:
SELECT
    id as __value,
    CASE WHEN COUNT(id) OVER (PARTITION BY name) > 1 AND name IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(name, ' - ', RIGHT(vin, 6)) ELSE COALESCE(name, CONCAT('VIN ', vin)) end as __text 
FROM cars
ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC, vin ASC
list.label: Car
list.name: car_id
list.query:
SELECT
    id as __value,
    CASE WHEN COUNT(id) OVER (PARTITION BY name) > 1 AND name IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(name, ' - ', RIGHT(vin, 6)) ELSE COALESCE(name, CONCAT('VIN ', vin)) end as __text 
FROM cars
ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC, vin ASC

list.definition:
WITH Aux AS
(SELECT car_id,
		COALESCE(efficiency, 
		(SELECT efficiency
			FROM cars WHERE id = $car_id) * 100) AS efficiency
	FROM (
		SELECT ROUND((charge_energy_added / NULLIF(end_rated_range_km - start_rated_range_km, 0))::numeric, 3) * 100 as efficiency,
			COUNT(*) as count, $car_id AS car_id 
		FROM charging_processes
		WHERE car_id = $car_id
			AND duration_min > 10
			AND end_battery_level <= 95
			AND start_rated_range_km IS NOT NULL
			AND end_rated_range_km IS NOT NULL
			AND charge_energy_added > 0
		GROUP BY 1
		ORDER BY 2 DESC
		LIMIT 1
	) AS DerivatedEfficiency
),
CurrentCapacity	 AS
(
	SELECT AVG(Capacity) AS Capacity
FROM (
SELECT 
	c.rated_battery_range_km * aux.efficiency / c.usable_battery_level AS Capacity
	FROM charging_processes cp
		INNER JOIN charges c
		ON c.charging_process_id = cp.id 
                INNER JOIN aux ON cp.car_id = aux.car_id
	WHERE cp.car_id = $car_id
		AND cp.end_date IS NOT NULL
		AND cp.charge_energy_added >= aux.efficiency
		AND c.usable_battery_level > 0
	 ORDER BY cp.end_date DESC LIMIT 10) AS lastCharges
)
SELECT Capacity FROM CurrentCapacity
list.name: current_capacity
list.query:
WITH Aux AS
(SELECT car_id,
		COALESCE(efficiency, 
		(SELECT efficiency
			FROM cars WHERE id = $car_id) * 100) AS efficiency
	FROM (
		SELECT ROUND((charge_energy_added / NULLIF(end_rated_range_km - start_rated_range_km, 0))::numeric, 3) * 100 as efficiency,
			COUNT(*) as count, $car_id AS car_id 
		FROM charging_processes
		WHERE car_id = $car_id
			AND duration_min > 10
			AND end_battery_level <= 95
			AND start_rated_range_km IS NOT NULL
			AND end_rated_range_km IS NOT NULL
			AND charge_energy_added > 0
		GROUP BY 1
		ORDER BY 2 DESC
		LIMIT 1
	) AS DerivatedEfficiency
),
CurrentCapacity	 AS
(
	SELECT AVG(Capacity) AS Capacity
FROM (
SELECT 
	c.rated_battery_range_km * aux.efficiency / c.usable_battery_level AS Capacity
	FROM charging_processes cp
		INNER JOIN charges c
		ON c.charging_process_id = cp.id 
                INNER JOIN aux ON cp.car_id = aux.car_id
	WHERE cp.car_id = $car_id
		AND cp.end_date IS NOT NULL
		AND cp.charge_energy_added >= aux.efficiency
		AND c.usable_battery_level > 0
	 ORDER BY cp.end_date DESC LIMIT 10) AS lastCharges
)
SELECT Capacity FROM CurrentCapacity
